title: This Week's Livestreamed Accelerator Talks
content: We have some great talks lined up for our accelerator this week! If you want expert help with A/B testing or startup branding, you'll definitely want to check out what's streaming from 500: A/B Testing with Mike Greenfield Mike Greenfield, entrepreneur and  analytics expert, will join 500 for a talk on everything you need to know about A/B testing. Watch it Wednesday, May 8th at 12:00 pm, PST. How to Build a Killer Brand Learn from the branding pros who created SendGrid (Jesse McCabe), FoodSpotting (Fiona Tang), .CO (Lori Anne Wardi), and  Love with Food (Aihui Ong). They'll share stories about what  branding/marketing strategies have worked – and failed – so you know what NOT to do. They'll also cove tips for strategic partnerships and targeted community outreach, along with smart strategies for launching, building, developing, and managing a strong brand. Watch it Thursday, May 9th at 12:00 pm, PST.
